articles.title: How We Used Gemini to Automate Document Processing
articles.excerpt: Building an OCR service with Google Gemini that extracts structured data from documents, reducing manual processing time by 90% at SetupInSaudi.
articles.content: At SetupInSaudi, we process hundreds of legal documents daily. Manual data extraction was becoming a bottleneck. Here's how we built an automated OCR service using Google Gemini that transformed our document processing workflow.

articles.title: Simplifying Saudi Visa Systems Through Code
articles.excerpt: How we built a comprehensive visa management system that handles multiple visa types, automated workflows, and real-time government portal integration.
articles.content: Saudi Arabia's visa system is complex, with multiple government portals and varying requirements. We built a unified system that simplifies the entire process for businesses and individuals.
